basics.name: Romain Lebesle
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Self taught full stack developer with 5+ years experiences.

work.name: ICODIA
work.summary: Architecture, design and development of user interfaces and APIs in a data center environment.
highlights: Analysis of customer needs
Writing of specifications
Writing of technical documentation
Setup tools and workflows for CI-CD
Setup of a microservices architecture

work.name: Freelance

highlights: Code reviews
Bot & Scraping
IPB Modules

work.name: SEGUR
work.summary: Developed of a web application allowing genealogists to create and manipulate family trees dedicated to notaries
highlights: Planned and documented the transition of the IT infrastructure
Closed external access to the IT infrastructure and setup strict routing rules.
Installed a server rack
Set up of a network infrastructure with a remote access
Built a gedcom parser for the web application
Wrote technical documentation and improved existing documentation of internal processes

work.name: Personal Project
